AppLU is a widget application\n

To make it work, 
just add it to your home screen. 
After adding first widget, you'll be able 
to launch or uninstall your apps 
directly from your home screen. 

You can choose between layouts in size:
 S, M or L
Name of the currently selected app
Index of the current app and number of found apps
Last apps ran from AppLU. You can click to run any of them
Launch button - runs currently selected app
Uninstall button - removes currently selected app from the system
App filter button - switch between user/system/all
Letter buttons - click on them to find your app
Backspace buttons - remove last or all letters from the filter
How to use the widgets?

Spell app name that you're trying to find, locate appropriate letters and click on them! 
That's it. 
If there are multiple results, just click on the app name field (1)
